# HttpContentExtensions.TryReadAsStringAsync method

Execute ReadAsStringAsync, catching exceptions.

```csharp
public static TryAsync<string> TryReadAsStringAsync(this HttpContent content, 
    CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| content | This HttpContent. |
| cancellationToken | An asynchronous operation cancellation token. |

## Return Value

A TryAsync of String.
